# denver-rentals

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

**Website:** https://natbprice.github.io/denver-rentals/

Saturday afternoon project to explore rental prices of single family residential
homes in the Denver metro area for upcoming move. Based on combination of
[Zillow data](https://www.zillow.com/research/data/)
[US Census shapefiles](https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/tiger-line-file.2018.html).
